net.zerobandwidth.android.lib.view.updaters

Class MenuItemUpdater

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.zerobandwidth.android.lib.view.updaters.MenuItemUpdater
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class MenuItemUpdater
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Updates the text and icon of a known MenuItem. This task class should be run directly on the UI thread by the context that creates it. 
    this.runOnUiThread( new MenuItemUpdater( mi, sCaption, resIconID ) ) ;
    Since:
    zerobandwidth-net/android 0.1.2 (#28)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected static int ICON_NOT_SET
      Magic value to be used for m_resIcon when no icon should be set.
      protected android.view.MenuItem m_mi
      The menu item to be updated.
      protected int m_resIcon
      The resource ID of the icon that should be used for the item.
      protected java.lang.String m_sCaption
      The text of the caption to be set for the item.
